2021.title: AlphaFold Protein Structure Database
2021.description: AlphaFold DB provides open access to over 200 million protein structure predictions to accelerate scientific research.

2021.title: PopDel
2021.description: PopDel (Population-wide Deletion Calling) is a lightweight tool for calling and genotyping deletions (of a few hundred base-pairs and upwards) in short read paired-end data.

2021.title: Pluto
2021.description: The Pluto platform simplifies secure, collaborative data sharing and bioinformatics analysis for academic, biotech, and pharmaceutical organizations.

2021.title: Cellenics
2021.description: Cellenics is an open-source platform aimed at empowering research biologists to analyze their own single-cell and spatial RNA sequencing datasets.

2021.title: SeqFu
2021.description: SeqFu is a general-purpose program to manipulate and parse information from FASTA/FASTQ files, supporting gzipped input files.
